CaseWare Cloud allows you to

A single cloud platform with unbelievable out of the "box" functionality.


CaseWare Cloud is a secure web-based collaboration platform that greatly improves the way you run your practice. With hassle-free updates, any-device access and new ways of tracking your engagements, CaseWare Cloud elevates your collaboration efforts to a whole new sphere.

File Storage

Seamlessly sync your WorkingPapers files to the cloud using CloudSync. Clients and stakeholders can now also interact through the same tools, collaborating with you in real-time on a single source.

Online CRM

All your entities, contacts, clients and staff in one convenient location making this the go-to destination for anything related to your practice.

Permissions

You now have fine-grained control over file access permissions among staff. These permissions can also be extended to include your clients which could allow for sharing of informtaion outside your practice.

Checklists

Checklists provide auditors with the ability to access a customized web based solution when they are filling out checklists. This can enable on-site audits where checklist responses are captured directly into the cloud.

Activities

The ground-breaking Activity Pulse provides a beat-by-beat account of engagement-related happenings at the touch of a button! What's better, it's all web-based, making it more convenient than ever for partners to keep an eye on business.

Chat

Chat is a new app that enables your staff to exchange text conversations over Cloud in real time. Communication between staff is done while working in the cloud, all in the same browser window.

Activate additional apps to enhance and maximize your practice solution.


One Cloud. Unlimited Possibilities.

Time & Billing

Review On The Go

CaseWare Q

With Time on the Go, you can easily capture time and expenses wherever you are. Manage your WIP and bill your clients all from one place, on any device. Integrates seamlessly with CaseWare Time 2013, allowing one shared database.

With Review on the Go, you can access client documents and issues, and complete role sign offs from any Internet-enabled browser on any supported mobile or tablet device. Synchronise using CloudSync, review with Review on the Go.

With Q and Cloud, CaseWare presents a better way to manage your engagement files. Q on your Working Papers file allows you to gather key data for engagements for the firm to monitor various metrics across the firm’s entire client base.

What to expect next on CaseWare Cloud.


More apps coming soon...

Tax Management

Q - Bits

Statutory Management

TaxWare on the cloud takes care of all of the administrative tasks associated with tax compliance for corporates, trusts and individuals.

CaseWare Q – Bits provides auditors and business stakeholders with an easy to use CAATTs (computer-assisted audit tools & techniques) solution, that facilitates data sampling, extraction and analysis for auditing purposes.

With SecWare, take care of compliance including all new forms (MOI and CoR) and terminology as required by the new Companies Act.

Technical Information


All you need to know about security, backups etc.

Where will my engagement data be stored?

Your data will be stored in state-of-the-art data centers operated by Amazon Web Services in Dublin, Ireland.

What kind of encryption is used?

Data that is transferred to and from CaseWare Cloud is 100% encrypted at the same strength used in online banking.

What type of controls are in place to protect my data?

Amazon provides physical security and logical security controls at the infrastructure layer. The platform is covered by a SSAE 16 report (done by Ernst and Young) and is PCI Level 1 certified, ISO 27001 certified, and compliant with all major security control frameworks.

What about support and backups?

Full backups of every client system are run daily. These are kept for 80 days, with no additional storage costs. 24/7 support is also available.

Plans & Pricing


How much does CaseWare Cloud cost?


Single User Plan

R110

per month - billed annually

(R1320 per year)

Office Plan

R275

per month - billed annually

(R3300 per year)

Standard features included:
  • 1 Individual user login
  • 5GB Storage**
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync licence)
  • CaseWare Time Integration (requires Time Desktop)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Standard features included:
  • 5 Individual user logins
  • 25GB Storage**
  • Entity, staff and contact management
  • Working Papers Integration (requires SmartSync licence)
  • CaseWare Time Integration (requires Time Desktop)
  • Unlimited portal access for your clients
  • Daily Backups
Additional users: R660 per annum (incl. additional 5GB storage)

** Additional storage: R55 per 5GB (or part thereof) billed monthly
